title: OVER 5OOO TEACHERS TRAINED IN ICT MODERN AGRICULTURE TECHNIQUES

tasks.task: Attending a two-day teachers' training program.
subtasks: Registering for the training event.
Reporting to the designated location (Isieno de Mluku Government's area) for the training.
Participating in interactive sessions on digital farming techniques.
Learning to use mobile applications for farm management.
Developing strategies for marketing agricultural products online.
Engaging in practical experiments to apply learned skills (e.g., farming, trading).
Learning how to use phones and computers safely for various tasks (e.g., password management, money transfers).
Sharing knowledge with peers and implementing innovative practices in schools and communities.

tasks.task: Conducting a training program as a facilitator.
subtasks: Designing and delivering sessions on ICT and modern agricultural practices.
Encouraging participants to share their knowledge and skills.
Monitoring the program's progress and ensuring compliance with guidelines.
Assisting in the coordination and smooth running of the program.
Providing guidelines and support to the facilitators and participants.
Expressing gratitude to the Senator Gautil Apwavio and the Small Scale and BDM Enterprises Agency for organizing the training.
Praising the training's impact and the newfound skills.
Praying for continued support and knowledge dissemination.

tasks.task: Preparing for the practical implementation of learned skills.
subtasks: Planning to integrate ICT and new farming techniques into teaching and daily life.
Setting goals for applying the acquired knowledge in schools and communities.
